sentence.Network_en: Imagine driving to Manakin - Sabot , outside of Richmond , Virginia , to see Jerry Parker's office in 1994.
sentence.Network_cn: 想象一下,在1994年开车到弗吉尼亚里士满杰瑞·帕克的办公室看看.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 侏儒鸟 (manakin) 求偶时并不用嘴巴发声，它们靠著翅膀的磨擦而发声。这听起来不像是鸟类啊，反而比较像是螽斯。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... managing 管理的 manakin 小鸟 manana 明天.

list.abs: ...这种当地人叫巴巴比(bababi，)学名叫做梅花翅娇鹟(clubwinged manakin)的南美小鸟的羽毛能够在特定频率下共振，从而形成这种音调.

means.word_mean: 1. a woman who wears clothes to display fashions;

sentences.sentence: "she was too fat to be a mannequin"

means.word_mean: 2. a life-size dummy used to display clothes
3. any of numerous small bright-colored birds of Central America and South America having short bills and elaborate courtship behavior

auth_sentence.content: Wire-tailed Manakin's natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical swamps.
